entry.title: 32nd anniversary of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that on the 32nd anniversary of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, the traditional venue for memorials in Hong Kong lay empty (blockade pictured) for the first time in thirty-two years?

entry.title: Margarita Gritskova (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that mezzo-soprano Margarita Gritskova was José Carreras's partner for his farewell concert in Carnegie Hall?

entry.title: Slovenian Waters Act referendum (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the union of taxi drivers offered the residents of retirement homes free transport to the voting stations in the Slovenian Waters Act referendum?

entry.title: Robert Goodsir (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Robert Goodsir, searching for his brother Harry, lost with the Franklin expedition in the Arctic, found the graves of three expedition members?

entry.title: Battlefield Vegas (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Battlefield Vegas employees during the 2017 Las Vegas shooting drove several armored personnel carriers to Mandalay Bay to shield police officers at the request of a LVMPD sergeant?

entry.title: Askimam (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Islamic website Askimam has been called more comprehensive, influential and wide-ranging than the web resources of al-Azhar and its sympathisers put together?

entry.title: Bronwyn Law-Viljoen (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that professor Bronwyn Law-Viljoen became editor-in-chief of a publishing company, co-founded her own independent publishing company, and founded her own bookstore in South Africa?

entry.title: Frozen II (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson called out Disney for an inaccurate Frozen II poster?

entry.title: 调校骁龙888+还得看荣耀 Magic 3 Pro试玩《原神》最高画质 (快科技)
entry.content: 目前中国有超过6亿手游玩家，玩手游已经成为日常，如今手游画质越来越高，对手机性能也提出了越来越高的要求。 有些手游重度爱好者，甚至买手机只看游戏性能，对于此类小伙伴，选择高通骁龙888

entry.title: 河南一家11人确诊新冠 邻居竟也被感染：原因无奈 (快科技)
entry.content: 8月16日晚，河南省商丘市网信办公布12例新冠肺炎确诊病例的活动轨迹。其中，10人为尹某某的亲属，2人为邻居。尹某为8月13日商丘市确诊的一名产妇，当日5时，商丘市第一人民医院在给患者开展核酸

entry.title: 东京奥运会拿下中国首金美女学霸上热搜：我在清华是学渣 (快科技)

entry.title: 在轨60天！太空出差三人组刷新驻留时长纪录 (快科技)

entry.title: 吴亦凡被批捕！曾驾保时捷破多条赛道纪录 专业车手揭秘 (快科技)

entry.title: 码农属于新生代农民工上热搜 网友：官宣了 没毛病 (快科技)
entry.content: 以往，很多程序员调侃自己为“码农”。而昨天人社部的一份报告，则等于“官宣”了——码农属于新生代农民工。随后，相关话题迅速登上微博热搜。 8月16日，人社部

entry.title: 17岁少年买不到回国机票攻击南航系统 结果惨了 (快科技)
entry.content: 15岁自学计算机技术，并且也有一定的技术水平，本来拥有大好的前途光明，但却因为自己的一时糊涂，做出违法的事情锒铛入狱，着实令人唏嘘不已。 据广州日报报道，现年17岁的小陈，上完小学三年

entry.title: 我国本土新增病例大幅下降：重灾区疫情缓解！ (快科技)
entry.content: 8月16日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例42例，其中境外输入病例36例（云南15例，广东9例，上海7例，广西2例，山东1例，四川1例，陕西1例），本土病例

entry.title: 恒大地产震动！许家印卸任 股价重挫 (快科技)
entry.content: 8月17日，国家企业信用信息公示系统显示，恒大地产集团有限公司今日变更董事长、总经理、法人代表。 变更后，许家印卸任恒大地产董事长，柯鹏卸任总经理、法人代表等职位，赵长龙同时接任董事长
